description: Tree work in Cons.Area - 2 plane (at rear of 18 Lonsdale Square).WORKS: a) Tree rear 19 Lonsdale Square - Plane Reduce by half large limb over Lonsdale garages.Lift carefully all smaller branches skirting around tree to clear 16'-20'.Reduce height of crown by one quarter. Deadwood and balance crown. b)Tree near 17 Lonsdale Square - Plane Remove large horizontal branch over hedge.Remove three other near horizontal over Lonsdale garages.Clean out and deadwood the three main leaders.Reduce height by up to 10' and the spread of crown by about one third. Thin by 20%.Reshape and balance crown.
decision_conditions: To protect the health and stability of trees to be retained on the site, and to ensure that a satisfactory standard of visual amenity is provided and maintained.
